New Records: England's successful chase of 329, the second-highest in ODI history at the West Indies; Liam Livingstone's maiden ODI century; England leveling the series with a five-wicket win
Key Match Events: Livingstone's acceleration in the latter part of the innings; England overcoming pressure despite the absence of several international stars; the series being tied 1-1 with the final match upcoming
Pre-Game Insights: England's need to win after their rain-hit opening defeat; Livingstone's hard work and preparation leading to his performance
Post-Match Reflections: Livingstone's pride in his achievement and enjoyment of the game; England's focus on staying alive in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Highest successful ODI chases in the West Indies; comparison table showing England's record chase
